item.title: Man charged with murder in door-knock prank shooting of 11-year-old boy
item.description: A man has been charged with murder in the shooting of a Houston boy who police said was playing a door-knocking prank on a neighbor's home.

item.title: Use of federal troops in Los Angeles is unlawful, judge says
item.description: The Trump administration's use of federal troops in Los Angeles to conduct law enforcement operations is unlawful, a federal judge ruled on Tuesday.

item.title: Hurricane Kiko forms in the Pacific, moving west
item.description: Hurricane Kiko has formed in the eastern Pacific Ocean, moving slowly westward

item.title: WATCH: Boy saved from monorail track at Hersheypark
